message.content: {"steps":[{"stepNo":1,"name":"Validate Ticket","analysis":"First step to validate the incoming support ticket format and content","toolId":"TICKET_VALIDATOR","next":2,"previous":0,"resultName":"validation_result","resultDescription":"Validation status and ticket details"},{"stepNo":2,"name":"Send Response","analysis":"Send automated response to customer based on ticket validation","toolId":"EMAIL_SENDER","next":-1,"previous":1,"resultName":"email_sent","resultDescription":"Confirmation of email delivery"}]}
